column4: Anyone would please help me getting my keyboard working correctly with ubuntu, since I can't get it to work correctly after trying almost anything I could think of...
That wasn't very descriptive. In what way is it not working correctly?
Sorry... the problem is that some key combinations don't get the expected output (form example, typing acute+c should give me a cedilla, but instead gives me a Ä‡)....
any clue what should be causing this issue?
